record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak in morning business for 15 minutes, and after I have completed my speech, Senator Cornyn be recognized for 15 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The Senator from New Hampshire is recognized for 15 minutes.

speaking.paragraph: I ask the Chair to notify me when I have used 10 minutes.
